bib.title: Individual neighbourhood exploration in complex multi-layered social network
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemyslaw and Br{\'o}dka, Piotr and Musial, Katarzyna
bib.abstract: Social networks can be extracted from different data about communication or common activities in organizations, companies or various Internet-based services. Different types of data processed may result in creation of separate layers in the complex multilayered social network. Analysis of neighbourhoods of network members and their utilization to social group discovery appears to be an interesting and important research domain. Since there is no measure to evaluate structure of the neighbourhoods in the multilayered social network
bib.booktitle: 2010 IEEE/WIC/ACM International Conference on Web Intelligence and Intelligent Agent Technology
